A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Besides the uninteresting\, pointless side plot\, the build up of the main plot to the disappointing tired resolution\, I'm concerned most with the kid pleasing and marvel inspired humor Disney decided to put into this movie.  I'm not excited to see what's next\, I have gone to opening night of every every star wars movie since P.M. I will not be doing it for episode ix.
